text: keeps hitting me every time i'm trusted to lead another museum tour – crazy responsibility feels!

loved hearing these takes…tour guides aren’t just peeps reciting facts! we’re storytellers breaking down history & culture every day – so yeah, not all dusty academics over here 😅 gotta keep things lively!
tour guides don't just talk all day... we're walking history books LOL
sometimes catch myself narrating stuff like i'm leading a tour... weird!
